name: Searching (itch)
description:
Making friends can be hard and at times incredibly scary. Learn to conquer your fear of being alone by making friends!  Walk around the school hallways and talk to some folks! Who know's maybe some of them can become your friend! 

Created by Thomas Newsome & Kailey Phan Mitchell

This game was a part of the 24 hour Spooky Game Jam of 2018. Organized by IDGA Chicago, the Voxelles and SugarGamers, and hosted  by 2112 Chicago
